CustomField.description: The name for the type of controlling ownership (e.g., publicly owned, privately owned, state owned). Note: For some countries, controlling ownership can be derived from the legal form.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name for the type of controlling ownership (e.g., publicly owned, privately owned, state owned). Note: For some countries, controlling ownership can be derived from the legal form.
CustomField.label: Control Ownership Type Description
